entry.title: $1799 // King Sz Rooms New Apt w/ Gym Laundry Roof Deck Central A/C Parking
entry.content:
Spacious 2 bedroom/ 1 full bathroom Bushwick apartment available for a November 1st move-in.

The apartment is located just off of the Wilson Ave L and Chauncey J subway stations for easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn.

The apartment includes a spacious living room and renovated kitchen as well as large bedrooms with big windows that allow plenty of natural light.

If interested, contact Hec at 718-812-4O72 and mention "Cooper"

ADDRESS: 282 Cooper St, Brooklyn, NY 11237

NO FEES!!!

ONE YEAR LEASE

- All that is needed is proof of income and good credit (guarantors are welcome)

INCLUDED:
- 2 Spacious Bedrooms
- 1 Full Bathroom
- Renovated Kitchen
- Large Windows in both rooms
- Close proximity to J and L Subways

If interested, contact Hec at 718-812-4O72 and mention "Cooper"
